group_1.textLeft: Kyubey...shrank?

group_1.textRight: His rings fell off, as well...and it appears@that he can no longer talk.
How curious...

group_1.textLeft: It must be because he lost all the functions@that made him "Kyubey".
Maybe this caused him to get cut off from the@rest of his network...?

group_1.textRight: Does this mean our wishes worked?

group_1.textLeft: Looks like it!
The next step is forming the purification@system, just like we planned!
Isn't that right, Ui?

group_1.textRight: She's grasping her chest. Don't tell me...@The price she paid was...her health...?

group_1.textLeft: Th-there's no way that's right!
Our bodies should be strong enough to @fight Witches now!

group_1.textRight: Ui?!

group_1.narration: ― Ui ―@AAAAAAAAAAAAAUGHHH!!!
― Touka ―@Her harvesting ability's going haywire?!
― Nemu ―@Touka, if we don't do something fast...!
― Touka ―@She's gonna...turn into a Witch...
― Nemu ―@We can't accomplish anything if that happens!@We'll just be forced to bear our fate!
― Touka ―@I know!@If I can just convert her impurities...
― Touka ―@...!
― Touka ―@Ngh!!!
― Touka ―@It's too much... I can't keep up with her!
― Nemu ―@You'll just burn through your magic.
― Touka ―@But I have to do something!
― Ui ―@*Sob* *Whimper*
― Touka ―@Ui...
― Nemu ―@I'll try manifesting it into something else!
― Nemu ―@One more try...
― Nemu ―@Ow...
― Nemu ―@There's just too much...
― Touka ―@UI!!!

group_1.textRight: We need to do something about all this@impurity gathering here, sì?

group_1.textLeft: You're...

group_1.textRight: I, Alina, shall create a force field and @quarantine the hospital.

group_1.narration: ― Alina ―@*Sigh*
― Alina ―@This was my first time making a@force field instead of a Labyrinth...
― Alina ―@But I guess it worked.

group_1.textLeft: Ah...aaaaaaaaarghhh!!!

group_1.textRight: Merda!

group_1.textLeft: ...It's too late.

group_1.textRight: You can't say that for sure yet.

group_1.textLeft: But there's nothing else can we do for her!

group_1.textRight: Yes there is!
This'll be the biggest risk of my life. I'll@make one of my stories manifest!

group_1.textLeft: You're going to bring a story to life?

group_1.textRight: Yes. One cannot become a Witch without their@human personality and emotions.
So I will pull out Ui by the soul!
If I take that story, and make it real...

group_1.textLeft: Nemu, you can't!
Ui's spirit will disappear if you don't have@a vessel to store it inside!

group_1.textRight: A vessel...something empty, without a@personality or any emotions...
This Kyubey! We took its abilities away,@so it just might work!

group_1.textLeft: Are you sure?
We have no idea what might happen once we@cut Ui away from this world!

group_1.textRight: It's the only choice we have!

group_1.textCenter: I hope I'm not too late!

group_1.narration: Until someone brings her soul@back to her physical body...
Ui's spirit will lay dormant inside@this hollowed-out Kyubey!
Have you heard? Has anyone told you?

group_1.textCenter: (Why did I, Alina, even come here?)
(I came to check on Nemu and Touka...)

group_1.narration: I jumped from the roof of the hospital.@Touka and Nemu found me...@I was checked in to the same hospital, where@I told them about many places in Kamihama.@When a Witch attacked, I saved them...
It's all coming back to me now.@The plan we all made...
I, Alina, discovered a Half-Witch in the@hospital lobby. It was absorbing energy.@I saved Nemu and Touka from it...
We started talking about Magical Girls and@came up with a plan to use the Half-Witch. We@realized it could help us achieve our goals.
I wanted to use this fascinating material,@Witches, to make my best artwork yet.
Touka wanted to become healthy and make a@deal with Kyubey to learn about the universe.
Nemu, too, wished to become healthy and@isolate this world to use as her parchment.
All our wishes fit together perfectly.
By supporting the Half-Witch as it kept@amassing impurities, I would be able to make@my magnum opus once it became a full Witch.
Using all that phase transition energy, we@could sustain the universe while isolating it@from Kyubey. We'd take the system to the rest@of the world, making their dream a reality.
So...

group_1.textRight: Yes, we were successful in seizing the@Half-Witch.

group_1.textLeft: Your Labyrinth was a big help, Alina!
We became Magical Girls at the perfect@time.
Thank goodness you were here!

group_1.textRight: We'll be counting on you to put the finishing@touches on this part of the plan.

group_1.textCenter: So long as the two of you supply me with@magic...va bene.
I will extend the hospital's force field to@cover Kamihama, keeping Kyubey out.
All of this in order to raise this Half-Witch@creation into a masterpiece.

group_1.textRight: Yes. It will ensure that no one will meddle@in our affairs.

group_1.textLeft: I'll save up some energy, so we'll be able@to slowly strengthen the force field too.
Okay then. For now...
I'll convert some of my energy and pass it@over to Alina.

group_1.textCenter: With this we have now taken the first step@in enacting our plans.
